name: Validate the Assign Staff form page without selecting status
description:
As a Admin
I want to able to navigate to the 'Manage User' page 
So that I can access its 'Assign Staff' functionality

steps.name: Given  Admin is on dashboard page after Login and clicks User on the navigation bar
Given  Admin is in Assign Staff details pop up page
When  Admin clicks Save button without giving Status for "team@gmail.com"
Then  Admin gets a Error message alert as Status is required
